title: A new wave of electric vehicles are ready to charge at 70 mph
description: Despite the advances in electric vehicle range, range anxiety persists. Hybrid models, such as the forthcoming Ramcharger, use gas engines to charge batteries, offering an interim solution. These hybrids cater to drivers hesitant to fully embrace electric vehicles amidst slow-charging infrastructure improvements, blending electric efficiency with gasoline reliability.
